message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $11,500 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,000.  This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, thank you for your latest offer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still aiming to keep my investment under $10,000. Would it be possible to reach an agreement at $9,500?
